name: Agile-Vacuum
summary: The goal of this project over the course of the academic quarter is to decompose project requirements and collaborate to prioritize, define, and implement features in an Agile team environment.
technology: Spring MVC/Boot, Thymeleaf, JQuery, Toastr, P5, CSS, H2Database, Maven, CircleCI, Heroku, Git

name: Wordle Clone
summary: A clone of the popular wordle game

name: TodoReact
summary: Todo app allowing a user to create/update/delete rows of items

name: Library-App
summary: Tutorial following Chad Darby and Eric Roby on how to create an online library app. Admin/User portal, checkout/return, writing reviews, authentication/authorization, pagination, and more
technology: Bootstrap CSS, React, Spring Boot, Spring Security, Stripe

name: Paint
summary: Paint app using multiple design pattern strategies: Strategy, Observer, Command, Static Factory, and Decorator

name: Inventory
summary: App using 2 microservices: shopping and inventory
technology: SpringBoot, Thymeleaf, BootStrap5, Lombok, Maven, MySQL, MongoDB, Docker, Heroku

name: Game Engine
summary: Built a simple game engine from scratch: Math library, memory management system, file system, Object Meshes

name: Multi-threaded Sound Engine
summary: Built a sound system using XAudio2. You can change pan, pitch, volume, loop, and repeat sounds

name: WebPortfolio
summary: Built a personal portfolio using the barebone of web dev tools
